name: Cappuccino
description: An espresso-based coffee drink that originated in Italy and is prepared with steamed milk foam.

name: Espresso
description: A concentrated coffee beverage brewed by forcing hot water under pressure through finely ground coffee.

name: Cornetto
description: An Italian variation of the croissant, often filled with jam, cream, or Nutella.

name: Frittata
description: An Italian omelette made with beaten eggs, cheese, and various ingredients such as vegetables, meat, or seafood.

name: Pandoro
description: A traditional Italian sweet yeast bread, typically enjoyed during the Christmas season.

name: Granita
description: A semi-frozen dessert made from sugar, water, and various flavorings.

name: Brioche
description: A buttery, flaky pastry often enjoyed with a cappuccino or other hot beverage.

name: Tiramisu
description: A popular Italian dessert made with ladyfingers, coffee, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa powder.

name: Prosciutto e Melone
description: A classic Italian appetizer made with cantaloupe melon and thinly sliced prosciutto.

name: Ricotta Toast
description: A simple and delicious Italian breakfast dish made with toasted bread and creamy ricotta cheese.
